document.full_text: more than 6 million people in north korea urgently need food aid due to a substantial cut in agricultural output, commercial imports and reduced bilateral assistance, the united nations said on friday.
document.title: more than 6 million people need food aid in north korea: u.n.
lines_and_colors: more than 6 million people in north korea urgently need food aid due to a substantial cut in agricultural output, commercial imports and reduced bilateral assistance, the united nations said on friday.
